amendment.description: Amendment sought to redirect $97.2 million to ground-based mid-course missile defense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to revise by reducing the amounts made available under the heading "RESEARCH, DEVELOPMENT, TEST AND EVALUATION- Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-wide", and increasing the amounts made available under that heading by $97,200,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Franks (AZ) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 249 (Roll no. 840).
